feat.name: Aberrant Dragonmark
entries: You have manifested an aberrant dragonmark. Determine its appearance and the flaw associated with it. You gain the following benefits:

items: You learn a {@filter cantrip of your choice from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=0|class=Sorcerer}. In addition, choose a {@filter 1st-level spell from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=1|class=Sorcerer}. You learn that spell and can cast it through your mark. Once you cast it, you must finish a short or long rest before you can cast it again through the mark. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

When you cast the 1st-level spell through your mark, you can expend one of your Hit Dice and roll it. If you roll an even number, you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to the number rolled. If you roll an odd number, one random creature within 30 feet of you (not including you) takes force damage equal to the number rolled. If no other creatures are in range, you take the damage.

entries: You also develop a random flaw from the Aberrant Dragonmark Flaws table.

entries.caption: Aberrant Dragonmark Flaws
rows: Your mark is a source of constant physical pain.
Your mark whispers to you. Its meaning can be unclear.
When you're stressed, the mark hisses audibly.
The skin around the mark is burned, scaly, or withered.
You have a mood swing any time you use your mark.
Your looks change slightly whenever you use the mark.
You have horrific nightmares after you use your mark.

entries.name: Option: Greater Aberrant Powers
entries: At the DM's option, a character who has the Aberrant Dragonmark feat has a chance of manifesting greater power. Upon reaching 10th level, such a character has a 10 percent chance of gaining an {@filter epic boon|rewards|type=boon} from among the options in chapter 7 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}. If the character fails to gain a boon, they have a 10 percent chance the next time they gain a level.

If the character gains a boon, the DM chooses it or determines it randomly. The character also permanently loses one of their Hit Dice, and their hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to a roll of that die plus their Constitution modifier (minimum reduction of 1). This reduction can't be reversed by any means.

feat.name: Acrobat
entries: You become more nimble, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 體操} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
As a bonus action, you can make a DC 15 Dexterity ({@skill 體操}) check. If you succeed, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement until the end of the current turn.

feat.name: 演員
entries: 精通於模仿和戲劇表演，讓你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你試圖將自己裝扮成另一個人時，你的魅力（{@skill 欺瞞}）和魅力（{@skill 表演}）檢定獲得優勢。
你可以模仿另一個人的口音或其他生物發出的聲音。你必須聽過被模仿者說話或發聲至少1分鐘。一次與你的魅力（{@skill 欺瞞}）檢定對抗成功的感知（{@skill 洞悉}），可以讓聆聽者辨識出這個聲音效果是假的。

feat.name: Alchemist
entries: You have studied the secrets of alchemy and are an expert in its practice, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with {@item 鍊金工具|phb}. If you are already proficient with them, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.
As an action, you can identify one potion within 5 feet of you, as if you had tasted it. You must see the liquid for this benefit to work.

Over the course of any short rest, you can temporarily improve the potency of one potion of healing of any rarity. To use this benefit, you must have {@item 鍊金工具|phb} with you, and the potion must be within reach. If the potion is drunk no more than 1 hour after the short rest ends, the creature drinking the potion can forgo the potion's die roll and regains the maximum number of hit points that the potion can restore.

feat.name: 警覺
entries: 經常對危機保持警惕，讓你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的先攻獲得+5加值。
當你意識清醒時不會被突襲。
其他生物對你進行的攻擊檢定並不會因爲你看不到它而獲得優勢。

feat.name: Animal Handler
entries: You master the techniques needed to train and handle animals. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 馴獸} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You can use a bonus action on your turn to command one friendly beast within 60 feet of you that can hear you and that isn't currently following the command of someone else. You decide now what action the beast will take and where it will move during its next turn, or you issue a general command that lasts for 1 minute, such as to guard a particular area.

feat.name: Arcanist
entries: You study the arcane arts, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 奧祕} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You learn the {@spell 魔法技倆} and {@spell 偵測魔法} spells. You can cast detect magic once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: 奇械學徒
entries: 你已習得些許奇械師的創造力：

items: 你從{@filter 奇械師法術列表|spells|level=0;1|class=artificer}中選擇並習得一個戲法。此外，你從該法術列表中選擇並習得一個一環法術。智力是你施展這些法術的施法關鍵屬性。
你可以在不消耗法術位的情況下施展一次來自此專長的一環法術。你必須在完成一次長休後才能再次這樣做。你也可以正常消耗法術位來施展該法術。
你獲得你所選的一項{@filter 工匠工具|items|type=artisan's tools}熟練，並且你可以將該工具作爲施展任何以智力爲施法關鍵屬性的法術的法器。

feat.name: Artificer Initiate
entries: You've learned some of an artificer's inventiveness, granting you the following benefits:

items: You learn one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter artificer spell list|spells|level=0;1|class=artificer}, and you learn one 1st-level spell of your choice from {@filter that list|spells|level=0;1|class=artificer}. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells. Whenever you gain a level, you can replace one of these spells with another spell of the same level from the artificer spell list.
You can cast this feat's 1st-level spell without a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have.

You gain proficiency with one type of {@filter artisan's tools|items|type=artisan's tools} of your choice, and you can use that type of tool as a spellcasting focus for any spell you cast that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability

feat.name: 運動健將
entries: 你曾經歷的大量肉體訓練，讓你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你{@condition 伏地}時，起身只需要花費5尺移動速度。
攀爬不會消耗額外的移動速度。
你只需要徒步移動5尺就可以進行跳高和跳遠，而非原本的10尺。

feat.name: Barbed Hide
entries: One of your ancestors was a barbed devil or other spiky fiend. Barbs protrude from your head. You gain the following benefits:

items: As a bonus action, you can cause small barbs to protrude all over your body or cause them to retract. At the start of each of your turns while the barbs are out, you deal {@damage 1d6} piercing damage to any creature grappling you or any creature {@condition 被擒} by you.
You gain proficiency in the {@skill 威嚇} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

feat.name: Blade Mastery
entries: You master the {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item longsword|phb}, {@item scimitar|phb}, {@item rapier|phb}, and {@item greatsword|phb}. You gain the following benefits when using any of them:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with the weapon.

On your turn, you can use your reaction to assume a parrying stance, provided you have the weapon in hand. Doing so grants you a +1 bonus to your AC until the start of your next turn or until you're not holding the weapon.
When you make an opportunity attack with the weapon, you have advantage on the attack roll.

feat.name: 慷慨吉運
entries: 你的族人們有着非同尋常的好運氣，而你也學習過如何在看到同伴陷入困境時神祕地把好運借給他們。你也不確定你是怎麼做到的；你只是想想，它就實現了。這無疑是你受到命運眷顧的象徵！
當一個與你距離30尺內，你能看見的隊友在攻擊檢定、能力檢定、或豁免檢定的d20中骰出了1，你可以使用你的反應來讓該隊友重新擲骰。該隊友必須使用新的擲骰結果。
當你使用這個能力，直到你的下個回合結束之前，你都不能使用你的幸運種族特性。

feat.name: 慷慨吉運
entries: 你的族人們有着非同尋常的好運氣，而你也學習過如何在看到同伴陷入困境時神祕地把好運借給他們。你也不確定你是怎麼做到的；你只是想想，它就實現了。這無疑是你受到命運眷顧的象徵！
當一個與你距離30尺內，你能看見的隊友在攻擊檢定、能力檢定、或豁免檢定的d20中骰出了1，你可以使用你的反應來讓該隊友重新擲骰。該隊友必須使用新的擲骰結果。
當你使用這個能力，直到你的下個回合結束之前，你都不能使用你的幸運種族特性。

feat.name: Brawny
entries: You become stronger, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 運動} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You count as if you were one size larger for the purpose of determining your carrying capacity.

feat.name: Burglar
entries: You pride yourself on your quickness and your close study of certain clandestine activities. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with {@item 盜賊工具|phb}. If you are already proficient with them, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.

feat.name: 衝鋒手
entries: 當你使用動作進行疾走時，你可以使用附贈動作來進行一次近戰武器攻擊或推撞一個生物。
若你直線移動至少10尺後馬上進行該附贈動作，則（若你選擇近戰攻擊且命中）該攻擊的傷害獲得+5加值，或（若你選擇推撞且成功）目標被推離你最多10尺。

feat.name: 大廚
entries: 花費在專研廚藝上的工夫已然有了回報，使你獲得了以下增益：

items: 如果你還沒有獲得{@item 廚師工具|phb}的熟練項，獲得之。
作爲短休的一部分，只要你手上有原料和{@item 廚師工具|phb}，你便可以烹飪特製料理。你可以爲特定數量的生物準備這種食物，其數量等同於4 + 你的熟練加值。在本次短休結束時，任何食用了料理並且花費了一個或更多生命骰來恢復生命值的生物恢復額外{@dice 1d8}點生命值。
在花費一小時精心製作後，或者在完成一次長休時，你可以製作等同於你熟練加值個數的餐點。這些餐點在製作完成後持續八小時。任何食用餐點的生物都能獲得等同於你熟練加值的臨時生命值。

feat.name: Chef
entries: Time and effort spent mastering the culinary arts has paid off. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with {@item 廚師工具|phb} if you don't already have it.

As part of a short rest, you can cook special food, provided you have ingredients and {@item 廚師工具|phb} on hand. You can prepare enough of this food for a number of creatures equal to 4 + your proficiency bonus. At the end of the short rest, any creature who eats the food and spends one or more Hit Dice to regain hit points regains an extra {@dice 1d8} hit points.

With one hour of work or when you finish a long rest, you can cook a number of treats equal to your proficiency bonus. These special treats last 8 hours after being made. A creature can use a bonus action to eat one of those treats to gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

feat.name: Critter Friend
entries: Your friendship with animals mystically deepens. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 馴獸} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You learn the {@spell 動物交談術} spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. You also learn the {@spell 化獸爲友} spell, and you can cast it once with this feat, without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

feat.name: 強弩專家
entries: 多虧你在弩上投入的大量訓練，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你忽略你所熟練的弩上的裝填屬性。
處於敵對生物5尺距離內並不會讓你的遠程攻擊獲得劣勢。
當你採取攻擊動作並且以單手武器攻擊，你可以使用附贈動作以一把你持握的{@item 手弩|phb}進行攻擊。

feat.name: 粉碎者
entries: 你擅長於碾碎敵人的技藝，你獲得了以下增益：

items: 每回合一次，當你用造成鈍擊傷害的攻擊命中一個生物時，只要目標的體型並未比你大一級以上，你就可以將目標移動五尺至一個未被佔據的空間。
當你用造成鈍擊傷害的攻擊命中一個生物並造成重擊時，直至你的下一回合開始，所有針對該生物的攻擊檢定具有優勢。

feat.name: Crusher
entries: You are practiced in the art of crushing your enemies, granting you the following benefits:

items: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals bludgeoning damage, you can move it 5 feet to an unoccupied space, provided the target is no more than one size larger than you.
When you score a critical hit that deals bludgeoning damage to a creature, attack rolls against that creature are made with advantage until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: 防禦式決鬥
entries: 當你持握一把你所熟練的靈巧武器，且另一個生物以近戰攻擊命中了你時，你可以針對此次攻擊使用你的反應將你的熟練加值加到AC上，這可能會讓該攻擊因此失手。

feat.name: Diplomat
entries: You master the arts of diplomacy, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 說服} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

If you spend 1 minute talking to someone who can understand what you say, you can make a Charisma ({@skill 說服}) check contested by the creature's Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) check. If you or your companions are fighting the creature, your check automatically fails. If your check succeeds, the target is {@condition 魅惑} by you as long as it remains within 60 feet of you and for 1 minute thereafter.

feat.name: 龍族恐怖
entries: 在感到憤怒時，你散發出威懾的氣息。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你可以花費一次你噴吐武器特性的使用額度，並非噴吐出毀滅性的能量，而是發出咆嘯以強迫距離你30尺內每個你所選擇的生物進行一次感知豁免檢定（DC爲8 + 你的熟練加值 + 你的魅力調整值）。如果目標不能聽見或看見你，則目標將自動通過豁免。若豁免失敗，則目標將對你感到{@condition 恐懼}持續1分鐘。如果因此陷入{@condition 恐懼}的目標受到任何傷害，它可以重複進行這個豁免檢定，並在豁免成功時終止此能力對自己的效果。

feat.name: 龍族恐怖
entries: 在感到憤怒時，你散發出威懾的氣息。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你可以花費一次你噴吐武器特性的使用額度，並非噴吐出毀滅性的能量，而是發出咆嘯以強迫距離你30尺內每個你所選擇的生物進行一次感知豁免檢定（DC爲8 + 你的熟練加值 + 你的魅力調整值）。如果目標不能聽見或看見你，則目標將自動通過豁免。若豁免失敗，則目標將對你感到{@condition 恐懼}持續1分鐘。如果因此陷入{@condition 恐懼}的目標受到任何傷害，它可以重複進行這個豁免檢定，並在豁免成功時終止此能力對自己的效果。

feat.name: 龍族皮革
entries: 你顯而易見的鱗片和利爪讓人想起了你的龍族先祖。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的鱗片變的堅硬。當你未穿着護甲，你可以使用13 + 你的敏捷調整值來算出你的AC。你可以在使用盾牌時而仍獲得這個好處。
你的指尖長出可伸縮的爪子。這對爪子是你可以用來進行徒手打擊的天生武器。如果你用它們命中目標，你造成等同於{@dice 1d4} + 你的力量調整值的揮砍傷害，而非原本徒手打擊的鈍擊傷害。

feat.name: 龍族皮革
entries: 你顯而易見的鱗片和利爪讓人想起了你的龍族先祖。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的鱗片變的堅硬。當你未穿着護甲，你可以使用13 + 你的敏捷調整值來算出你的AC。你可以在使用盾牌時而仍獲得這個好處。
你的指尖長出可伸縮的爪子。這對爪子是你可以用來進行徒手打擊的天生武器。如果你用它們命中目標，你造成等同於{@dice 1d4} + 你的力量調整值的揮砍傷害，而非原本徒手打擊的鈍擊傷害。

feat.name: Dragon Wings
entries: You sprout draconic wings. With your wings, you have a flying speed of 20 feet if you aren't wearing heavy armor and aren't exceeding your carrying capacity.

feat.name: Dragonmark of Detection
entries: Your have the magical mark of Detection, the dragonmark of House Medani, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 偵測魔法}, {@spell 法師之手}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 偵測思想}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 銳眼術}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Finding
entries: Your have the magical mark of Finding, the dragonmark of House Tharashk, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 鑑定術}, {@spell 法師之手}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 物品定位術}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 銳眼術}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Handling
entries: Your have the magical mark of Handling, the dragonmark of House Vadalis, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 德魯伊伎倆}, {@spell 動物交談術}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 野獸知覺}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 召喚動物}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Healing
entries: Your have the magical mark of Healing, the dragonmark of House Jorasco, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 治療傷勢}, {@spell 拯救瀕死}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 次級復原術}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 回生術}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Hospitality
entries: Your have the magical mark of Hospitality, the dragonmark of House Ghallanda, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Charisma as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 交友術}, {@spell 隱形僕役}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 通天繩}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 李歐蒙小屋}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Making
entries: Your have the magical mark of Making, the dragonmark of House Cannith, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 鑑定術}, {@spell 修復術}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 魔化武器}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 鬼斧神工}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Passage
entries: Your have the magical mark of Passage, the dragonmark of House Orien, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 腳底抹油}, {@spell 光亮術}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 迷蹤步}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 傳送法陣}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Scribing
entries: Your have the magical mark of Scribing, the dragonmark of House Sivis, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 通曉語言}, {@spell 傳訊術}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 短訊術}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 巧舌術}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Sentinel
entries: Your have the magical mark of Sentinel, the dragonmark of House Deneith, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 劍刃防護}, {@spell 強迫決鬥}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 朦朧術}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 防護能量}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Shadow
entries: Your have the magical mark of Shadow, the dragonmark of House Phiarlan and House Thuranni, and are a member of one of those houses.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Charisma as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 舞光術}, {@spell 易容術}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 黑暗術}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 迴避偵測}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Storm
entries: Your have the magical mark of Storm, the dragonmark of House Lyrander, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 雲霧術}, {@spell 電爪}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 造風術}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 雪雨暴}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Warding
entries: Your have the magical mark of Warding, the dragonmark of House Kundarak, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell 警報術}, {@spell 提升抗力}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 祕法鎖}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell 防護法陣}

feat.name: 高等卓爾魔法
entries: 你學會更多的黑暗精靈魔法。你習得{@spell 偵測魔法}法術並可以隨意施放它，無需消耗法術位。你也習得{@spell 浮空術}和{@spell 解除魔法}，並可以各自施放一次而無需消耗法術位。你在完成一次長休後重新獲得施放這兩個法術的能力。這三個法術的施法屬性是魅力。

feat.name: 高等卓爾魔法
entries: 你學會更多的黑暗精靈魔法。你習得{@spell 偵測魔法}法術並可以隨意施放它，無需消耗法術位。你也習得{@spell 浮空術}和{@spell 解除魔法}，並可以各自施放一次而無需消耗法術位。你在完成一次長休後重新獲得施放這兩個法術的能力。這三個法術的施法屬性是魅力。

feat.name: 雙持客
entries: 你精通於雙持武器作戰，獲得下列好處：

items: 當你每隻手都各持握一把近戰武器時，你的AC獲得+1加值。
即使你持握的單手近戰武器並非輕型，你仍可以進行雙武器戰鬥。
在你原本只能拔出或入鞘一把武器的時候，你可以同時拔出或入鞘二把單手武器。

feat.name: 地城探索者
entries: 警戒於大多地城中會發現的隱藏陷阱和密門，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你在搜索密門時所進行的感知（{@skill 察覺}）和智力（{@skill 調查}）檢定中有優勢。
你在躲避或抵抗陷阱時的豁免檢定中有優勢。
對於陷阱所造成的傷害具有抗性。
以快速步速旅行並不會對你的被動感知（{@skill 察覺}）數值造成原本的-5減值。

feat.name: 耐性
entries: 堅強而持久，你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你骰生命骰來恢復生命值時，每顆生命骰恢復的生命值最少等於你體質調整值的兩倍（最少爲2）。

feat.name: Dwarf Resilience
entries: You have the blood of dwarf heroes flowing through your veins. You gain the following benefits:

items: Whenever you take the {@action 閃避} action in combat, you can spend one Hit Die to heal yourself. Roll the die, add your Constitution modifier, and regain a number of hit points equal to the total (minimum of 1).

feat.name: 矮人堅毅
entries: 你的體內流淌着矮人英雄的血脈。你獲得下列好處：

items: 每當你在戰鬥中採取{@action 閃避}動作時，你可以消耗一顆生命骰以治療你自己。骰該生命骰，加上你的體質調整值，並回復等同於其總和數值的生命值（最少爲1）。

feat.name: 魔能導師
entries: 對神祕學的研究使你解鎖了體內的祕法能量。你從契術師職業中選擇並獲得一項{@filter 魔能祈喚|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=EI}。如果該祈喚具有任何先決條件，則僅當你是一位滿足該條件的契術師時才能選擇該祈喚。
當你升級時，你可以將該祈喚更換爲契術師職業中的另一個魔能祈喚。

feat.name: Eldritch Adept
entries: Studying occult lore, you have unlocked eldritch power within yourself: you learn one {@filter Eldritch Invocation|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=EI} option of your choice from the warlock class. If the invocation has a prerequisite, you can choose that invocation only if you're a warlock and only if you meet the prerequisite.
Whenever you gain a level, you can replace the invocation with another one from the warlock class.

feat.name: 元素行家
entries: 當你獲得此專長時，選擇下列一種傷害類型：強酸、冷凍、火焰、閃電、雷鳴。
你施放的法術忽視你所選擇傷害類型的抗性。此外，當你施放法術造成所選類型的傷害時，你可以將所有傷害骰骰出的1視爲2。
你可以多次選擇獲得此專長。每次你這麼做，都必須選擇一種不同的傷害類型。

feat.name: 精靈之準
entries: 精靈的準確性是衆所周知的，尤其是精靈弓箭手和施法者。你在依賴精確度而非蠻力的攻擊中有着不可思議的準頭。你獲得下列好處：

items: 每當你在使用敏捷、智力、感知、或魅力的攻擊檢定中具有優勢，你可以重骰其中一顆骰子一次。

feat.name: 精靈之準
entries: 精靈的準確性是衆所周知的，尤其是精靈弓箭手和施法者。你在依賴精確度而非蠻力的攻擊中有着不可思議的準頭。你獲得下列好處：

items: 每當你在使用敏捷、智力、感知、或魅力的攻擊檢定中具有優勢，你可以重骰其中一顆骰子一次。

feat.name: Empathic
entries: You possess keen insight into how other people think and feel. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 洞悉} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You can use your action to try to get uncanny insight about one humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you. Make a Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) check contested by the target's Charisma ({@skill 欺瞞}) check. If your check succeeds, you have advantage on attack rolls and ability checks against the target until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Everybody's Friend
entries: You develop your magnetic personality to ease your way through the world. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 欺瞞} and {@skill 說服} skills. If you're already proficient in either skill, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any check you make with that skill.

feat.name: 消失無蹤
entries: 你的族人在幻術系魔法上聰穎且握有獨門訣竅。你學過一種在你受到傷害時消失無蹤的魔法把戲。你獲得下列好處：

items: 緊接在你受到傷害後，你可以使用一個反應以用魔法變得{@condition 隱形}直到你的下個回合結束，或直到你攻擊、造成傷害、或強迫某人進行一次豁免檢定。一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用此能力。

feat.name: 消失無蹤
entries: 你的族人在幻術系魔法上聰穎且握有獨門訣竅。你學過一種在你受到傷害時消失無蹤的魔法把戲。你獲得下列好處：

items: 緊接在你受到傷害後，你可以使用一個反應以用魔法變得{@condition 隱形}直到你的下個回合結束，或直到你攻擊、造成傷害、或強迫某人進行一次豁免檢定。一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用此能力。

feat.name: Fell Handed
entries: You master the {@item handaxe|phb}, {@item battleaxe|phb}, {@item greataxe|phb}, {@item warhammer|phb}, and {@item maul|phb}. You gain the following benefits when using any of them:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with the weapon.
Whenever you have advantage on a melee attack roll you make with the weapon and hit, you can knock the target {@condition 伏地} if the lower of the two {@dice d20} rolls would also hit the target.

Whenever you have disadvantage on a melee attack roll you make with the weapon, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier (minimum of 0) if the attack misses but the higher of the two {@dice d20} rolls would have hit.

If you use the {@action 協助} action to aid an ally's melee attack while you're wielding the weapon, you knock the target's shield aside momentarily. In addition to the ally gaining advantage on the attack roll, the ally gains a +2 bonus to the roll if the target is using a shield.

feat.name: 精類傳送
entries: 你對高等精靈傳說的研究解開了除了你的雅靈表親外，很少其他精靈擁有的精族力量。藉助於你的精類血統，你可以暫時地躍穿妖精荒野以縮短從一處到另一處的距離。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你習得說、讀、寫木族語。
你習得{@spell 迷蹤步}法術，並可以無需消耗法術位施放一次。你在完成一次短休或長休後重新獲得施放此法術的能力。這個法術的施法屬性是智力。

feat.name: 精類傳送
entries: 你對高等精靈傳說的研究解開了除了你的雅靈表親外，很少其他精靈擁有的精族力量。藉助於你的精類血統，你可以暫時地躍穿妖精荒野以縮短從一處到另一處的距離。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你習得說、讀、寫木族語。
你習得{@spell 迷蹤步}法術，並可以無需消耗法術位施放一次。你在完成一次短休或長休後重新獲得施放此法術的能力。這個法術的施法屬性是智力。

feat.name: 精類觸碰
entries: 暴露在妖精荒野的魔法之下的經歷已經改變了你，使你獲得了以下增益：

items: 你習得{@spell 迷蹤步}以及一個由你選擇的{@filter 一環法術|spells|level=1|school=E;D}。該一環法術必須是預言系或者惑控系法術。你可以在不消耗法術位的情況下施展這些法術各一次。當你以此法施展某個法術後，你不能再次以此法施展該法術，直至你完成一次長休。你也可以消耗合適的法術位來施展這些法術。這些法術的施法關鍵屬性是你由此專長提升的屬性。

feat.name: Fey Touched
entries: Your exposure to the Feywild or one of its denizens has left a magical mark on you. You gain the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell 迷蹤步} spell and one {@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=E;D} of your choice. The 1st-level spell must be from the divination or enchantment school of magic. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells in this way, you can't cast that spell in this way again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells' spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: 戰鬥學徒
entries: 你的軍事訓練幫助你養成了一種特定的戰術風格。因此，你可以從戰士職業中選擇並習得一項{@filter 戰鬥風格|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=FS:F}。如果你已經有一項戰鬥風格，你不能選擇相同的戰鬥風格。
每當你升級並達到獲得屬性值提升特性的等級時，你可以來自此專長的戰鬥風格替換爲戰士職業中的另一項你未習得的戰鬥風格。

feat.name: Fighting Initiate
entries: Your martial training has helped you develop a particular style of fighting. As a result, you learn one {@filter Fighting Style|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=FS:F} option of your choice from the fighter class. If you already have a style, the one you choose must be different.
Whenever you gain a level, you can replace this feat's fighting style with another one from the fighter class that you don't have.

feat.name: Flail Mastery
entries: The {@item flail|phb} is a tricky weapon to use, but you have spent countless hours mastering it. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with a flail.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can prepare yourself to extend your flail to sweep over targets' {@item shield|phb|shields}. Until the end of this turn, your attack rolls with a flail gain a +2 bonus against any target using a {@item shield|phb}.
When you hit with an opportunity attack using a flail, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or be knocked {@condition 伏地}.

feat.name: 弗萊格索斯之焰
entries: 你學會呼喚地獄之火以服從你的命令。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你爲你所施放的法術擲骰決定火焰傷害時，你可以重骰任何你在火焰傷害骰中骰出的1，但你必須使用新的擲骰結果，即使其結果仍然是1。
每當你施放一個造成火焰傷害的法術時，你可以使烈焰環繞着你直到你的下個回合結束。這團烈焰不會傷害你或你的所有物，且會散發30尺範圍的明亮光照和再延伸30尺的微光光照。當這團烈焰存在時，任何距離你5尺內且以近戰攻擊命中你的生物將受到{@dice 1d4}火焰傷害。

feat.name: 弗萊格索斯之焰
entries: 你學會呼喚地獄之火以服從你的命令。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你爲你所施放的法術擲骰決定火焰傷害時，你可以重骰任何你在火焰傷害骰中骰出的1，但你必須使用新的擲骰結果，即使其結果仍然是1。
每當你施放一個造成火焰傷害的法術時，你可以使烈焰環繞着你直到你的下個回合結束。這團烈焰不會傷害你或你的所有物，且會散發30尺範圍的明亮光照和再延伸30尺的微光光照。當這團烈焰存在時，任何距離你5尺內且以近戰攻擊命中你的生物將受到{@dice 1d4}火焰傷害。

feat.name: Gift of the Chromatic Dragon
entries: You've manifested some of the power of chromatic dragons, granting you the following benefits:

items: As a bonus action, you can touch a simple or martial weapon and infuse it with one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. For the next minute, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 1d4} damage of the chosen type when it hits. After you use this ability, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

When you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage, you can use your reaction to give yourself resistance to that instance of damage. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Gift of the Gem Dragon
entries: You've manifested some of the power of gem dragons, granting you the following benefits:

items: When you take damage from a creature that is within 10 feet of you, you can use your reaction to emanate telekinetic energy. The creature that dealt damage to you must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier of the score increased by this feat) or take {@dice 2d8} force damage and be pushed 10 feet away from you. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Gift of the Metallic Dragon
entries: You've manifested some of the power of metallic dragons, granting you the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell cure wounds} spell. You can cast this spell without expending a spell slot. Once you cast this spell in this way, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast this spell using spell slots you have. The spell's spellcasting ability is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma when you cast it with this feat (choose when you gain this feat).

You can manifest protective wings that can shield you or others from attacks. When you or another creature you can see within 5 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can use your reaction to manifest spectral wings from your back for a moment. Roll a {@dice d4} and grant a bonus to the target's AC equal to the number rolled against that attack roll, potentially causing it to miss. You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Gourmand
entries: You have mastered a variety of special recipes, allowing you to prepare exotic dishes with useful effects. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with {@item 廚師工具|phb}. If you are already proficient with them, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.
As an action, you can inspect a drink or plate of food within 5 feet of you and determine whether it is {@condition 中毒}, provided that you can see and smell it.

During a long rest, you can prepare and serve a meal that helps you and your allies recover from the rigors of adventuring, provided you have suitable food, {@item 廚師工具|phb}, and other supplies on hand. The meal serves up to six people, and each person who eats it regains two additional Hit Dice at the end of the long rest. In addition, those who partake of the meal have advantage on Constitution saving throws against disease for the next 24 hours.

feat.name: 擒抱者
entries: 你着重磨練了如何保持近距離擒抱的技巧。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你對被你擒抱的生物所進行的攻擊檢定有優勢。
你可以使用動作嘗試壓制被你擒抱而處於{@condition 被擒}狀態的生物。若要這麼做，你需要進行另外一次擒抱檢定。若成功，則直到結束擒抱之前，你與該生物同時進入{@condition 束縛}狀態。

feat.name: 巨武大師
entries: 你學會了如何將武器重量轉化爲優勢，利用其動量來增強你的打擊。你獲得下列好處：

items: 在你的回合，當你用近戰武器造成重擊、或將一名生物的生命值降至0，你可以使用附贈動作再進行一次近戰武器攻擊。
在你使用你所熟練的重型武器進行近戰攻擊之前，你可以選擇讓該次攻擊檢定承受-5的減值。若該次攻擊命中，該次攻擊的傷害+10。

feat.name: Grudge-Bearer
entries: You have a deep hatred for a particular kind of creature. Choose your foes, a type of creature to bear the burden of your wrath: aberrations, beasts, celestials, constructs, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, giants, monstrosities, oozes, plants, or undead. Alternatively, you can choose two races of humanoid (such as gnolls and orcs). You gain the following benefits:

items: During the first round of any combat against your chosen foes, your attack rolls against any of them have advantage.
When any of your chosen foes makes an opportunity attack against you, it makes the attack roll with disadvantage.

Whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill 奧祕}, {@skill 歷史}, {@skill 自然}, or {@skill 宗教}) check to recall information about your chosen foes, you add double your proficiency bonus to the check, even if you're not normally proficient.

feat.name: 槍手
entries: 你持槍時的手快眼明使你獲得了以下增益：

items: 你獲得槍械的熟練項（見城主指南的"{@variantrule Firearms|DMG}"欄目）。
你忽略槍械的裝填屬性。
你在敵對生物５尺範圍內發動遠程攻擊檢定時，不會因此而具有劣勢。

feat.name: Gunner
entries: You have a quick hand and keen eye when employing firearms, granting you the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with firearms (see "{@variantrule Firearms|DMG}" in the Dungeon Master's Guide).
You ignore the loading property of firearms.
Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls.

feat.name: 治療師
entries: 你是名嫺熟的醫者，能夠快速地治療傷口並讓隊友們重返戰場。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你使用{@item 醫療工具組|phb}穩定瀕死生物的傷勢時，該生物同時恢復1點生命值。
以一個動作，你可以消耗醫療工具組的一次使用額度照顧一個生物，並恢復他{@dice 1d6+4}加上等同該生物最大生命骰數量的生命值。直到完成短休或長休之前，該生物都不能再通過此專長恢復生命值。

feat.name: 重度着甲
entries: 你受訓於熟練重甲的使用方法，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你獲得重甲的熟練。

feat.name: 重甲大師
entries: 你可以利用護甲偏斜掉對他人足以致命的攻擊。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你穿着重甲時，非魔法武器對你造成的鈍擊、穿刺、揮砍傷害減少3點。

feat.name: Historian
entries: Your study of history rewards you with the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 歷史} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

When you take the {@action 協助} action to aid another creature's ability check, you can make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill 歷史}) check. On a success, that creature's check gains a bonus equal to your proficiency bonus, as you share pertinent advice and historical examples. To receive this bonus, the creature must be able to understand what you're saying.

feat.name: Human Determination
entries: You are filled with a determination that can draw the unreachable within your reach. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can do so with advantage. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: 煉獄體質
entries: 邪魔血脈在你體內脈動，解開了一種類似某些邪魔所擁有的韌性。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你擁有對冷凍和毒素傷害的抗性。
你在對抗{@condition 中毒}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

feat.name: 煉獄體質
entries: 邪魔血脈在你體內脈動，解開了一種類似某些邪魔所擁有的韌性。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你擁有對冷凍和毒素傷害的抗性。
你在對抗{@condition 中毒}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

feat.name: 激勵統御
entries: 你可以花費10分鐘來激勵你的同伴，鼓舞他們對戰鬥的信心。若你這麼做，選擇30尺內最多6個可以看到或聽到你且理解你的友善生物（可以包括你自己）。每個生物可以獲得等同你的等級加上你的魅力調整值的臨時生命值。直到完成短休或長休之前，受影響的生物都不能再通過此專長獲得臨時生命值。

feat.name: Investigator
entries: You have an eye for detail and can pick out the smallest clues. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 調查} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You can take the {@action 搜尋} action as a bonus action.

feat.name: 敏思強記
entries: 你擁有着能以不可思議的精確度牢牢追蹤時間、方位、以及細節的大腦。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你永遠知道哪個方位是北方。
你永遠知道距離下一次日出或日落還剩下幾個小時。
你可以精準回憶起過去一個月內你曾聽到或看到的任何事物。

feat.name: 輕度着甲
entries: 你受訓於熟練輕甲的使用方法，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你獲得輕甲的熟練。

feat.name: 語言學家
entries: 你致力研究於語言和密碼。獲得下列好處：

items: 你習得三種自選語言。
你能夠巧妙地創造出書寫密碼。其他人無法破譯你創造的密碼，除非你教導他們、他們成功通過一次智力檢定（DC等於你的智力值 + 你的熟練加值）、或是他們使用魔法破譯。

feat.name: 幸運
entries: 你的離奇運氣讓你可以在最危險的時刻化險爲夷。
你獲得3點幸運點。當你進行攻擊檢定、屬性檢定、或豁免檢定時，你可以花費一點幸運點以再骰一顆額外的d20。你可以選擇在你擲骰之後，但決定結果之前才花費幸運點。你選擇要使用哪一顆d20以用在該攻擊檢定、屬性檢定、或豁免檢定。
你也可以在一次對你的攻擊檢定被進行時選擇花費一點幸運點。骰一顆d20，然後選擇該次攻擊要使用攻擊者還是你的骰子。如果有超過一個生物花費幸運點以影響一次擲骰的結果，則幸運點將彼此抵消；不需要擲任何額外的骰子。
你在完成一次長休後恢復所有你花費掉的幸運點。

feat.name: 巫師殺手
entries: 你精熟於在近身戰鬥中對付施法者的實用技巧，獲得下列好處：

items: 當一個處於你5尺範圍內的生物施展法術，你可以使用你的反應對該生物進行一次近戰武器攻擊。
當你傷害了一個正專注於法術的生物，該生物在維持專注的豁免檢定中獲得劣勢。
你在對抗處於你5尺範圍內的生物所施展的法術時的豁免檢定中獲得優勢。

feat.name: 魔法學徒
entries: 選擇一個職業：{@filter 吟遊詩人|spells|level=0;1|class=bard}、 {@filter 牧師|spells|level=0;1|class=cleric}、{@filter 德魯伊|spells|level=0;1|class=druid}、{@filter 術士|spells|level=0;1|class=sorcerer}、{@filter 契術師|spells|level=0;1|class=warlock}或{@filter 法師|spells|level=0;1|class=wizard}。你從你所選職業的法術列表中習得兩個戲法。
此外，從同一個列表中選擇一個1環法術。你習得該法術，並可以用最低環階來施展它。一旦你施展它，則直到你完成一次長休之前，你都無法再借由這個專長來施展它。

這些法術的施法屬性取決於你所選的職業：{@filter 吟遊詩人|spells|level=0;1|class=bard}、{@filter 術士|spells|level=0;1|class=sorcerer}、{@filter 契術師|spells|level=0;1|class=warlock}使用魅力；{@filter 牧師|spells|level=0;1|class=cleric}、{@filter 德魯伊|spells|level=0;1|class=druid}使用感知；{@filter 法師|spells|level=0;1|class=wizard}則使用智力。

feat.name: 戰技專家
entries: 你所經歷的戰技訓練讓你可以施展獨特戰技。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你習得二個{@filter 戰技|optionalfeatures|feature type=MV:B}，從戰士{@class 戰士|phb|戰鬥大師|Battle Master|phb|2-0}範型的戰技列表中選擇。若你使用的戰技要求你的目標進行一次豁免檢定以抵抗戰技的效果，則豁免檢定的DC等同8 + 你的熟練加值 + 你的力量或敏捷調整值（由你選擇）。
你獲得一顆卓越骰（這顆骰將被加到任何你從其他來源獲得的卓越骰池中），若你沒有其他卓越骰，則這顆卓越骰爲d6。這顆骰被用來啓動你的戰技。卓越骰將在你使用戰技時被花費。你在完成一次短休或長休後恢復你花費掉的卓越骰。

feat.name: Master of Disguise
entries: You have honed your ability to shape your personality and to read the personalities of others. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with the {@item 易容工具|phb}. If you are already proficient with it, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

If you spend 1 hour observing a creature, you can then spend 8 hours crafting a disguise you can quickly don to mimic that creature. Making the disguise requires a {@item 易容工具|PHB}. You must make checks as normal to disguise yourself, but you can assume the disguise as an action.

feat.name: Medic
entries: You master the physician's arts, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 醫療} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

During a short rest, you can clean and bind the wounds of up to six willing beasts and humanoids. Make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill 醫療}) check for each creature. On a success, if a creature spends a Hit Die during this rest, that creature can forgo the roll and instead regain the maximum number of hit points the die can restore. A creature can do so only once per rest, regardless of how many Hit Dice it spends.

feat.name: 中甲大師
entries: 你精通於在穿着中甲時行動，獲得下列好處：

items: 穿着中甲不會讓你的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定獲得劣勢。
當你穿着中甲時，如果你的敏捷爲16或以上，你的AC可以增加3點，而非2點。

feat.name: Menacing
entries: You become fearsome to others, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 威嚇} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

When you take the {@action 攻擊} action on your turn, you can replace one attack with an attempt to demoralize one humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you. Make a Charisma ({@skill 威嚇}) check contested by the target's Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) check. If your check succeeds, the target is {@condition 恐懼} until the end of your next turn. If your check fails, the target can't be {@condition 恐懼} by you in this way for 1 hour.

feat.name: Metabolic Control
entries: You have refined psionic control over your body's functions.

items: If your Psionic Talent die is available, you can take an action to channel your psionic power to nourish yourself for the next 24 hours, as if you consumed sufficient food and water for a day. When you take this action, your Psionic Talent die decreases by one die size.

If your Psionic Talent die is available, you can meditate for 1 minute, at the end of which you gain the benefits of finishing a short rest, and your Psionic Talent die decreases by one die size. You can't meditate in this way again until you finish a long rest.

feat.name: 超魔法導師
entries: 你習得如何往你的法術上施加你的意志，從而改變它們的功能：

items: 你從術士職業中選擇並習得兩項{@filter 超魔法|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=MM}選項。除非特別說明，否則一個法術施展時只能應用一種超魔法選項。當你升級並達到獲得屬性值提升特性的等級時，你可以將其中一項超魔法選項替換爲術士職業中的另一項超魔法選項。
你獲得2點術法點，用於施展超魔法（這些術法點和任何其他來源的術法點疊加，但只能用於超魔法）。你在完成長休後重獲所有已消耗的術法點。

feat.name: Metamagic Adept
entries: You've learned how to exert your will on your spells to alter how they function. You gain the following benefits:

items: You learn two {@filter Metamagic|optionalfeatures|Feature Type=MM} options of your choice from the sorcerer class. You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless the option says otherwise. Whenever you gain a level, you can replace one of your Metamagic options with another one from the sorcerer class.

You gain 2 sorcery points to spend on Metamagic (these points are added to any sorcery points you have from another source but can be used only on Metamagic). You regain all spent sorcery points when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: 機動性
entries: 你特別地迅速而靈巧。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的移動速度增加10尺。
當你採取疾走動作時，該回合內的困難地形不會消耗你額外的移動速度。
當你對一個生物進行近戰攻擊後，無論你命中與否，你在該回合都不會再引發該生物的藉機攻擊。

feat.name: 中度着甲
entries: 你受訓於熟練中甲和盾牌的使用方法，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你獲得中甲和盾牌的熟練。

feat.name: 騎乘戰鬥
entries: 騎乘中的你是個危險的敵手。當你在騎乘時且不處於{@condition 無力}，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你對任何體型比你坐騎還小，且非騎乘的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中獲得優勢。
你可以強迫以你坐騎爲目標的攻擊轉爲以你爲目標。
若你的坐騎受到需要進行敏捷豁免來減半傷害的效果影響，則牠在豁免成功時可以不承受傷害，且即使豁免失敗也只承受一半的傷害。

feat.name: Naturalist
entries: Your extensive study of nature rewards you with the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 自然} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You learn the {@spell 德魯伊伎倆} and {@spell 偵測毒素或疾病} spells. You can cast {@spell 偵測毒素或疾病} once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: 敏銳觀察
entries: 你能夠迅速注意周遭環境的細節，你獲得下列好處：

items: 若你可以在一個生物正以你理解的語言說話時看見它的嘴巴，你就可以通過讀脣語來理解目標正在說什麼。
你的被動感知（{@skill 察覺}）和被動智力（{@skill 調查}）獲得+5加值。

feat.name: Orcish Aggression
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

feat.name: 獸人狂怒
entries: 你的狂怒怒火燃燒不倦。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你使用一把簡易或軍用武器的攻擊命中時，你可以再額外骰一顆該武器的傷害骰，並將它作爲具有該武器傷害類型的額外傷害加入。一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用此能力。
緊接在你使用你的頑強耐性特性後，你可以使用你的反應以進行一次武器攻擊。

feat.name: 獸人狂怒
entries: 你的狂怒怒火燃燒不倦。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你使用一把簡易或軍用武器的攻擊命中時，你可以再額外骰一顆該武器的傷害骰，並將它作爲具有該武器傷害類型的額外傷害加入。一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用此能力。
緊接在你使用你的頑強耐性特性後，你可以使用你的反應以進行一次武器攻擊。

feat.name: Perceptive
entries: You hone your senses until they become razor sharp. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 察覺} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
Being in a lightly obscured area doesn't impose disadvantage on your Wisdom ({@skill 察覺}) checks if you can both see and hear.

feat.name: Performer
entries: You master performance so that you can command any stage. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 表演} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

While performing, you can try to distract one humanoid you can see who can see and hear you. Make a Charisma ({@skill 表演}) check contested by the humanoid's Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) check. If your check succeeds, you grab the humanoid's attention enough that it makes Wisdom ({@skill 察覺}) and Intelligence ({@skill 調查}) checks with disadvantage until you stop performing.

feat.name: 穿刺者
entries: 你已經可以在戰鬥中造成精準的穿刺。你獲得以下好處:

items: 每回合一次，當你用造成穿刺傷害的攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以重擲其中一個傷害骰，並且你必須使用重投的結果。
當你用造成穿刺傷害的攻擊命中一個生物並且造成重擊時，你可以在計算重擊傷害時投一個額外的傷害骰。

feat.name: Piercer
entries: You have achieved a penetrating precision in combat, granting you the following benefits:

items: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals piercing damage, you can reroll one of the attack's damage dice, and you must use the new roll.
When you score a critical hit that deals piercing damage to a creature, you can roll one additional damage die when determining the extra piercing damage the target takes.

feat.name: 毒師
entries: 你可以準備並使用致命的毒藥。你獲得以下好處：

items: 當你投造成毒素傷害的傷害骰時，無視目標的傷害抗性。
你可以以一個附贈動作爲一把武器或一枚彈藥塗毒，而不是一個動作。

你獲得{@item 製毒工具|phb}的熟練項，如果你還沒有的話。花費一小時使用{@item 製毒工具|phb}進行製作，並且消耗價值 50gp 的材料後，你可以製造一定數量的猛毒，其數量等同於你的熟練加值。當被用於一把武器或一枚彈藥後，猛毒的毒性持續一分鐘或直至你用該武器或彈藥攻擊命中後。當一個生物受到來自塗毒武器或彈藥的傷害後，該生物必須成功通過DC 14的體質豁免，否則將受到{@damage 2d8}毒素傷害並陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態，直至你的下回合結束。

feat.name: Poisoner
entries: You can prepare and deliver deadly poisons, gaining the following benefits:

items: When you make a damage roll, you ignore resistance to poison damage.
You can coat a weapon in poison as a bonus action, instead of an action.

You gain proficiency with the {@item 製毒工具|phb} if you don't already have it. With one hour of work using a {@item 製毒工具|PHB} and expending 50 gp worth of materials, you can create a number of doses of potent poison equal to your proficiency bonus. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute, or until you hit with the weapon. When a weapon coated in this poison deals damage to a creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} poison damage and become {@condition 中毒} until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: 長武大師
entries: 你可以使用觸及武器以牽制你的敵人。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你採取攻擊動作且只使用{@item 長柄刀|phb}、{@item 斧槍|phb}、{@item 長棍|phb}或{@item 矛|phb}進行攻擊時，你可以使用附贈動作以利用該武器的另一端進行一次近戰攻擊；這個攻擊使用和主要攻擊相同的屬性調整值。這個攻擊所使用的武器傷害骰爲d4，且該攻擊造成鈍擊傷害。
當你持握{@item 長柄刀|phb}、{@item 斧槍|phb}、{@item 長柄槍|phb}、{@item 長棍|phb}或{@item 矛|phb}時，其他生物將在進入你的觸及範圍時觸發你的藉機攻擊。

feat.name: Practiced Expert
entries: You have honed your proficiency with particular skills or tools, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with one {@table skills|phb|skill} or {@filter tool|items|type=tool;artisan's tools} of your choice.
Choose one of your skill or tool proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses the chosen proficiency.

feat.name: 奇才
entries: 你掌握着學習新事物的訣竅。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你獲得一個你所選擇的{@table skills|phb|技能熟練}、一個你所選擇的{@filter 工具熟練|items|type=tool;artisan's tools}、並能流暢的使用一種你所選擇的語言。
選擇一個你所熟練的技能。你獲得對該技能的專精，這代表你的熟練加值在任何你使用它進行的屬性檢定中變爲兩倍。你所選擇的技能必須尚未得益於其他可以將熟練加值翻倍的效果，像是專精特性。

feat.name: 奇才
entries: 你掌握着學習新事物的訣竅。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你獲得一個你所選擇的{@table skills|phb|技能熟練}、一個你所選擇的{@filter 工具熟練|items|type=tool;artisan's tools}、並能流暢的使用一種你所選擇的語言。
選擇一個你所熟練的技能。你獲得對該技能的專精，這代表你的熟練加值在任何你使用它進行的屬性檢定中變爲兩倍。你所選擇的技能必須尚未得益於其他可以將熟練加值翻倍的效果，像是專精特性。

feat.name: Quick-Fingered
entries: Your nimble fingers and agility let you perform sleight of hand. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 巧手} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
As a bonus action, you can make a Dexterity ({@skill 巧手}) check to plant something on someone else, conceal an object on a creature, lift a purse, or take something from a pocket.

feat.name: Quicksmithing
entries: You have mastered the art of on-the-fly invention, improvement, and jury-rigging. You can use your talents to create immediate, short-term magical effects similar to spells, given time and an adequate supply of aether.

When you choose this feat, you master two magical effects, each of which recreates the effect of a 1st-level spell that has the ritual tag. These spells can come from any class list, but Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for them.

If you come across a schematic geared toward quicksmithing or study with another quicksmith, you might be able to add another spell to the effects you have mastered. The spell's level can be no higher than half your level (rounded up), and it must have the ritual tag. The process of mastering the spell takes 2 hours per level of the spell, and costs 50 gp per level. The cost represents aether you use as you experiment with the spell effect to master it.

In addition, you have proficiency with {@item 工匠工具|phb} (quicksmith's tools). Using those tools, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of materials to construct a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 hp). The device ceases to function after 24 hours unless you spend 1 hour repairing it to keep it functioning. You can use your action to dismantle the device, at which point you can reclaim the materials used to create it. You can have up to three such devices active at a time.
When you create a device, choose one of the following options:

entries.name: Clockwork Toy
entries: This toy is a clockwork animal, monster, or person, such as a frog, mouse, bird, dragon, or soldier. When placed on the ground, the toy moves 5 feet across the ground on each of your turns in a random direction. It makes noises as appropriate to the creature it represents.

entries.name: Fire Starter
entries: This device produces a miniature flame, which you can use to light a candle, torch, or campfire. Using the device requires your action.

entries.name: Music Box
entries: When opened, this music box plays a single song at a moderate volume. The box stops playing when it reaches the song's end or when it is closed.

feat.name: 適應力

choose.entry: Increase the chosen ability score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

entries: 選擇一個屬性值。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你獲得使用所選屬性進行的豁免檢定的熟練。

feat.name: Revenant Blade
entries: You are descended from a master of the {@item double-bladed scimitar|ERLW}, and some of that mastery has passed on to you. You gain the following benefits:

items: While you are holding a double-bladed scimitar with two hands, you gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.
A double-bladed scimitar has the finesse property when you wield it.

feat.name: 儀式施法者
entries: 你已學會一些能夠以儀式施放的法術。這些法術被寫在一本儀式書中，當你施展其中一個法術時你必須將儀式書拿在手中。

當你選擇此專長時，你獲得一本記載着兩個自選1環法術的儀式書。從以下職業中選擇一個：{@filter 吟遊詩人|spells|level=1|class=bard|components & miscellaneous=ritual}、{@filter 牧師|spells|level=1|class=cleric|components & miscellaneous=ritual}、{@filter 德魯伊|spells|level=1|class=druid|components & miscellaneous=ritual}、{@filter 術士|spells|level=1|class=sorcerer|components & miscellaneous=ritual}、{@filter 契術師|spells|level=1|class=warlock|components & miscellaneous=ritual}或{@filter 法師|spells|level=1|class=wizard|components & miscellaneous=ritual}。你必須從該職業的法術列表中選擇你的法術，且你所選的法術必須要具有儀式標籤。你所選的職業同時會決定你在使用這些法術時的施法屬性：吟遊詩人、術士、契術師使用魅力；牧師、德魯伊使用感知；法師則使用智力。
若你遇到某個以書寫形式存在的法術，像是魔法法術卷軸或法師的法術書，你就有可能可以將它加到你的儀式書中。該法術必須要在你所選職業的法術列表上，該法術的環階不能超過你等級的一半（小數點進位），且它必須要具有儀式標籤。將法術抄寫到你的儀式書的過程需要耗費每環2小時的時間、以及每環50金幣的代價。這個代價代表了你在研究如何掌握該法術時所消耗的材料構材、以及你在抄寫時所需要的優質墨水。

feat.name: 野蠻攻擊者
entries: 每回合一次，當你爲一次近戰武器攻擊骰傷害時，你可以重骰該武器傷害骰，並任選其中一個結果使用

feat.name: 二次機會
entries: 命運在某人嘗試攻擊你時眷顧着你。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當一個你所能看見的生物以一次攻擊檢定命中你時，你可以使用你的反應以強迫該生物重骰。一旦你使用此能力，直到你在戰鬥開始時骰先攻、或直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用此能力。

feat.name: 二次機會
entries: 命運在某人嘗試攻擊你時眷顧着你。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當一個你所能看見的生物以一次攻擊檢定命中你時，你可以使用你的反應以強迫該生物重骰。一旦你使用此能力，直到你在戰鬥開始時骰先攻、或直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用此能力。

feat.name: 哨兵
entries: 你精通在敵人防禦時佔盡優勢的技巧，獲得下列好處：

items: 當你以藉機攻擊命中一個生物時，該生物在該回合剩下時間的移動速度變爲0。
離開你觸及範圍的生物即使採取了撤離動作，仍然會觸發你的藉機攻擊。
當一個與你距離5尺內的生物對你以外的目標進行了一次攻擊（且該目標不具有此專長），你可以使用你的反應對該攻擊者進行一次近戰武器攻擊。

feat.name: Servo Crafting
entries: You are skilled in the creation of servos—tiny constructs that function as personal assistants. You can cast the {@spell 尋獲魔寵} spell as a ritual, creating a servo to serve as your familiar instead of an animal. A servo's statistics appear in the "Artifact Creatures" section of this document. In every other way, a servo familiar functions as described in the {@spell 尋獲魔寵} spell.
You can communicate telepathically with your servo familiar and perceive through its senses as long as you are on the same plane of existence. You can speak through your servo in your own voice.
Additionally, when you take the {@action 攻擊} action, you can forgo one of your own attacks to allow your servo familiar to make one attack of its own.

feat.name: 影界觸碰
entries: 暴露在墮影冥界的魔法之下的經歷已經改變了你，使你獲得了以下增益：

items: 你習得{@spell 隱形術}以及一個由你選擇的{@filter 一環法術|spells|level=1|school=I;N}。該一環法術必須是幻術系或死靈系法術。你可以在不消耗法術位的情況下施展這些法術各一次。當你以此法施展某個法術後，你不能再次以此法施展該法術，直至你完成一次長休。你也可以消耗合適的法術位來施展這些法術。這些法術的施法關鍵屬性是你由此專長提升的屬性。

feat.name: Shadow Touched
entries: You learn how to bend shadows from your experience with the Shadowfell. You gain the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell 黑暗術} spell and one {@filter 1st-level spell|spells|level=1|school=I;N} of your choice. The 1st-level spell must be from the illusion or necromancy school of magic. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells in this way, you can't cast that spell in this way again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells' spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: 神射手
entries: 你精通於遠程武器，且能夠做出他人眼中不可能的射擊。你獲得下列好處：

items: 攻擊長射程範圍中的目標並不會讓你的遠程武器攻擊檢定因此獲得劣勢。
你的遠程武器攻擊忽略半掩護和四分之三掩護。
在你以所熟練的遠程武器進行攻擊之前，你可以選擇讓該次攻擊檢定承受-5的減值。若該次攻擊命中，該次攻擊的傷害+10。

feat.name: 盾牌大師
entries: 你的盾牌不僅僅是爲了防禦、更能被用來進攻。當你持握{@item 盾牌|phb}時，你獲得下列好處：

items: 如果你在你的回合採取攻擊動作，你可以使用附贈動作利用你的盾牌嘗試推撞一個與你距離5尺內的生物。
如果你不處於{@condition 無力}，你可以將你盾牌的AC加值加到用以對抗只以你爲目標的法術或其他有害效果的敏捷豁免檢定上。
如果你受到了某個效果允許你進行敏捷豁免檢定以減半傷害，你可以使用你的反應以在你成功通過豁免檢定時，將你的盾牌插入你和效果源頭之間，好讓你不受傷害。

feat.name: Shield Training
entries: You've trained in the effective use of shields. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with {@item shield|phb|shields}.
In combat, you can don or doff a shield as the free object interaction on your turn.
If you have the Spellcasting or Pact Magic feature, you can use a shield as a spellcasting focus.

feat.name: Silver-Tongued
entries: You develop your conversational skill to better deceive others. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 欺瞞} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

When you take the {@action 攻擊} action on your turn, you can replace one attack with an attempt to deceive one humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you. Make a Charisma ({@skill 欺瞞}) check contested by the target's Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) check. If your check succeeds, your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from the target and your attack rolls against it have advantage; both benefits last until the end of your next turn or until you use this ability on a different target. If your check fails, the target can't be deceived by you in this way for 1 hour.

feat.name: 技藝專家
entries: 你已磨練了自身的特定技藝，並獲得了以下好處：

items: 你選擇並獲得一項技能的熟練項。
選擇一項你熟練的技能，你獲得該技能的專精，可以將兩倍的熟練加值加到使用該技能進行的屬性檢定上。你選擇的技能必須未受益於其他使熟練加值翻倍的特性，例如專精特性。

feat.name: 技巧嫺熟
entries: 你獲得總共3種的自選{@book 技能|phb|7|skills}或{@filter 工具|items|type=tool;artisan tool;instrument;gaming set;vehicle (land);vehicle (water)}的熟練。

feat.name: 潛行者
entries: 你是潛行於陰影中的專家。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你對於你想躲避的生物而言處於輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試躲藏。
當你對某個生物而言躲藏狀態，且你對它進行的遠程武器攻擊失手，則進行該攻擊並不會因此暴露你的位置。
微光不會對你依賴於視覺的感知（{@skill 察覺}）檢定造成劣勢。

feat.name: 劈砍者
entries: 你已熟知該砍向何處以造成最重的傷害。你獲得以下好處：

items: 每回合一次，當你用造成揮砍傷害的攻擊命中一個生物時，你可以使其速度降低10尺，直到你的下回合開始。
當你用造成揮砍傷害的攻擊命中一個生物並造成重擊時，你將其重傷，使其所作的攻擊檢定具有劣勢，直至你的下回合開始。

feat.name: Slasher
entries: You've learned where to cut to have the greatest results, granting you the following benefits:

items: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack that deals slashing damage, you can reduce the speed of the target by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
When you score a critical hit that deals slashing damage to a creature, you grievously wound it. Until the start of your next turn, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls.

feat.name: Spear Mastery
entries: Though the {@item spear|phb} is a simple weapon to learn, it rewards you for the time you have taken to master it. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with a spear.

When you use a spear, its damage die changes from a {@dice d6} to a {@dice d8}, and from a {@dice d8} to a {@dice d10} when wielded with two hands. (This benefit has no effect if another feature has already improved the weapon's die.)

You can set your spear to receive a charge. As a bonus action, choose a creature you can see that is at least 20 feet away from you. If that creature moves within your spear's reach on its next turn, you can make a melee attack against it with your spear as a reaction. If the attack hits, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage, or an extra {@damage 1d10} piercing damage if you wield the spear with two hands. You can't use this ability if the creature used the {@action 撤離} action before moving.
As a bonus action on your turn, you can increase your reach with a spear by 5 feet for the rest of your turn.

feat.name: 法術射手
entries: 你熟習於利用特定法術強化你攻擊的技巧，獲得下列好處：

items: 當你施放一個需要你進行一次攻擊檢定的法術時，該法術的射程加倍。
你的遠程法術攻擊忽略半掩護和四分之三掩護。

你學會一個需要一次攻擊檢定的戲法。從{@filter 吟遊詩人|spells|level=0|class=bard|spell attack=m;r;o}、{@filter 牧師|spells|level=0|class=cleric|spell attack=m;r;o}、{@filter 德魯伊|spells|level=0|class=druid|spell attack=m;r;o}、{@filter 術士|spells|level=0|class=sorcerer|spell attack=m;r;o}、{@filter 契術師|spells|level=0|class=warlock|spell attack=m;r;o}或{@filter 法師|spells|level=0|class=wizard|spell attack=m;r;o}法術列表中選擇該戲法。該戲法的施法屬性取決於你所選的法術列表：吟遊詩人、術士、契術師使用魅力；牧師、德魯伊使用感知；法師則使用智力。

feat.name: 矮身靈巧
entries: 你有着以你種族來說也相當不尋常的靈巧。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的步行速度增加5尺。
你獲得{@skill 體操}或{@skill 運動}其中之一的熟練（由你選擇）。
你在掙脫{@condition 被擒}時所進行的力量（運動）或敏捷（體操）檢定有優勢。

feat.name: 矮身靈巧
entries: 你有着以你種族來說也相當不尋常的靈巧。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的步行速度增加5尺。
你獲得{@skill 體操}或{@skill 運動}其中之一的熟練（由你選擇）。
你在掙脫{@condition 被擒}時所進行的力量（運動）或敏捷（體操）檢定有優勢。

feat.name: Stealthy
entries: You know how best to hide. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 隱匿} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
If you are hidden, you can move up to 10 feet in the open without revealing yourself if you end the move in a position where you're not clearly visible.

feat.name: Survivalist
entries: You master wilderness lore, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 生存} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You learn the {@spell 警報術} spell. You can cast it once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: 斯奈布力魔法
entries: 你繼承了來自你先祖的天生施法能力。此能力允許你對自己隨意施放{@spell 迴避偵測}，且無須材料構材。你也可以通過此能力各自施放下列法術一次：{@spell 目盲/耳聾術}、{@spell 朦朧術}、和{@spell 易容術}。當你完成一次長休，你將重新獲得施放這些法術的能力。
這些法術的施法屬性是智力，你只能以它們的最低環階施放它們。

feat.name: Tandem Tactician
entries: Your presence in a scrap tends to elevate your comrades. You gain the following benefits:

items: You can use the {@action 協助} action as a bonus action.

When you use the {@action 協助} action to aid an ally in attacking a creature, increase the range of the {@action 協助} action by 10 feet. Additionally, you can help two allies targeting the same creature within range when you use the {@action 協助} action this way.

feat.name: 酒館拳王
entries: 習慣於抄起任何剛好在手邊的武器加入混戰亂鬥，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你熟練於臨時武器。
你的徒手打擊使用d4作爲傷害骰。
當你在你的回合使用徒手打擊或臨時武器命中一個生物，你可以使用附贈動作以嘗試擒抱該目標。

feat.name: 念動力
entries: 你習得用你的意念移動物體的能力。你獲得以下好處：

items: 你習得{@spell 法師之手}戲法，你施展它無需語言構材或材料構材，並且你可以讓該幽靈手{@condition 隱形}。如果你已經習得該戲法，你施展該戲法時其施法距離提升30尺。該戲法的施法關鍵屬性是你由此專長提升的屬性。
以一個附贈動作，你可以嘗試以念動力推撞30尺內的一個你可見的生物。當你這樣做時，目標必須成功通過一次力量豁免（DC爲8 + 你的熟練加值 + 你由此專長提升的屬性的屬性調整值），否則將被你拉近或推離五尺。目標生物可以自願放棄豁免。

feat.name: Telekinetic
entries: You learn to move things with your mind. You gain the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell 法師之手} cantrip. You can cast it without verbal or somatic components, and you can make the spectral hand {@condition 隱形}. If you already know this spell, its range increases by 30 feet when you cast it. Its spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

As a bonus action, you can try to telekinetically shove one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. When you do so, roll your Psionic Talent die, and the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier of the score increased by this feat) or be moved toward you or away from you a number of feet equal to 5 times the number you rolled. A creature can willingly fail this save.

feat.name: Telekinetic
entries: You learn to move things with your mind. You gain the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell 法師之手} cantrip. You can cast it without verbal or somatic components, and you can make the spectral hand invisible.

As a bonus action, you can try to shove one creature you can see within 5 feet of the spectral hand created by your {@spell 法師之手} spell. When you do so, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier) or be pushed 5 feet away from you.

feat.name: 心電感應
entries: 你覺醒了用意念與其他生物交流的能力。你獲得以下好處：

items: 你可以和60尺內任何你可見的生物用心靈感應進行交流。你的心電溝通以一種你已知的語言的形式進行，該生物必須懂得該語言才能理解你。你的主動溝通並未給予該生物以心靈感應的形式回覆你的能力。
你可以施展{@spell 偵測思想}法術，無需法術位和構材。以此法施法後，你在完成一次長休前不能再這樣做。該法術的施法關鍵屬性是你由此專長提升的屬性。如果你擁有二環或更高的法術位，你可以消耗這些法術位施展該法術。

feat.name: Telepathic
entries: You awaken the ability to mentally connect with others. You gain the following benefits:

items: You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see within 30 feet of you. Your telepathic utterances are in a language you know, and the creature understands you only if it knows that language. Your communication doesn't give the creature the ability to respond to you telepathically.

If your Psionic Talent die is available, you can cast the {@spell 偵測思想} spell, requiring no components. When you start casting the spell, your Psionic Talent die decreases by one die size. Your spellcasting ability for the spell is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: Telepathic
entries: You awaken the ability to mentally connect with others. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice from the following list: {@skill 欺瞞}, {@skill 洞悉}, {@skill 威嚇}, or {@skill 說服}.
You can communicate telepathically with any creature you can see within 30 feet of you. If it understands at least one language, it can respond to you telepathically.

feat.name: Theologian
entries: Your extensive study of religion rewards you with the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 宗教} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You learn the {@spell 奇術} and {@spell 偵測善惡} spells. You can cast {@spell 偵測善惡} once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: 健壯
entries: 當你獲得此專長時，你的生命值最大值增加等同於你等級兩倍的數值。每當你在這之後提升等級，你的生命值最大值都會再額外增加2點生命值。

feat.name: Tower of Iron Will
entries: Your mind's defenses are formidable. After you or another creature you can see within 30 feet of you fails a saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll your Psionic Talent die and add the number rolled to the saving throw, potentially causing it to succeed.

feat.name: Tracker
entries: You have spent time hunting creatures and honed your skills, gaining the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell 獵人印記} spell. You can cast it once without expending a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.
You have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill 生存}) checks to track creatures

feat.name: Vampiric Exultation
entries: As an action, you can transform the lower half of your body into an inky black vapor, allowing you to float through the air. While transformed, you have a flying speed of 30 feet. You can maintain this form for up to 10 minutes. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: 戰鬥施法者
entries: 你受訓於混亂戰場的中心施展法術，學習這項技巧讓你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你受到傷害時，你在爲維持法術專注而進行的體質豁免檢定上有優勢。
即使你單手或雙手持有武器或{@item 盾牌|phb}，你也可以做出法術所要求的姿勢構材。
當一個敵意生物的移動觸發了你的藉機攻擊，你可以使用你的反應以對該生物施展法術，而非進行一次藉機攻擊。該法術的施法時間必須爲1個動作，且只能以該生物爲目標。

feat.name: Warhammer Master
entries: {@note This feat is presented as an illustrative example of a poorly-designed feat, and is not intended to be used in play. The {@feat Fell Handed|UAFeats} feat is presented as a well-designed implementation of the same ideas, and should be used instead.}
When you hit a creature with a {@item warhammer|phb}, the  creature must succeed on a Strength saving  throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your  Strength modifier) or be knocked {@condition 伏地}.

In addition, you can use your warhammer to  knock away a foe's shield. If you hit a creature  that's using a shield, you can have the attack deal  no damage and force the creature to drop its  shield.

feat.name: 武器大師
entries: 你已受過大量使用各種武器的訓練，獲得下列好處：

items: 你獲得4種自選簡易武器或軍用武器的熟練。

feat.name: Wild Talent
entries: You awaken to your psionic potential, which enhances your mind or body. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20, to represent this enhancement.

You also harbor a wellspring of psionic power within yourself, an energy that ebbs and flows as you channel it in various ways. This power is represented by your Psionic Talent die, the starting size of which is a {@dice d6}.

entries.name: Psionic Talent Options
entries: You can use your Psionic Talent die in the following ways:

items.name: Psi-Boosted Ability.
items.entry: When you make an ability check with the ability increased by this feat, you can roll your Psionic Talent die and add the number rolled to the check. You can choose to do so before or after rolling the {@dice d20}, but before you know whether the check succeeded or failed.

items.name: Psi-Guided Strike.
items.entry: Once on each of your turns when you hit with an attack roll that uses the ability increased by this feat, you can roll your Psionic Talent die after you make the damage roll and then replace one of the damage dice with the number rolled on the Psionic Talent die.

entries.name: Changing the Die's Size
entries: If you roll the highest number on your Psionic Talent die, it decreases by one die size after the roll. This represents you burning through your psionic energy. For example, if the die is a {@dice d6} and you roll a 6, it becomes a {@dice d4}. If it's a {@dice d4} and you roll a 4, it becomes unusable until you finish a long rest.

Conversely, if you roll a 1 on your Psionic Talent die, it increases by one die size after the roll, up to its starting size. This represents you conserving psionic energy for later use. For example, if you roll a 1 on a {@dice d4}, the die then becomes a {@dice d6}.

Whenever you finish a long rest, your Psionic Talent die resets to its starting size. When you reach certain levels, the starting size of your Psionic Talent die increases: at 5th level ({@dice d8}), 11th level ({@dice d10}), and 17th level ({@dice d12}). If you have a Psionic Talent die from another source, such as a class feature, you don't get more than one die; use only the one with the largest starting size.

entries.name: Psi Replenishment
entries: As a bonus action, you can calm your mind for a moment and restore your Psionic Talent die to its starting size. You then can't use Psi Replenishment again until you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Wonder Maker
entries: You master the tinker techniques of your people. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you make a check using your proficiency with {@item 修理工具|phb}, you add double your proficiency bonus to the check.
When you make a device with your Tinker trait, you have the following additional options for what you make:

items.name: Alarm
entries: This device senses when a creature moves to within 15 feet of it without speaking aloud a password chosen when you create it. One round after a creature moves into range, the alarm makes a shrill ringing that lasts for 1 minute and can be heard from up to 300 feet away.

items.name: Calculator
entries: This device makes doing sums easy.

items.name: Lifter
entries: This device can be used as a block and tackle, allowing its user to hoist five times the weight the user can normally lift.

items.name: Timekeeper
entries: This pocket watch keeps accurate time.

items.name: Weather Sensor
entries: When used as an action, this device predicts weather conditions in a 1-mile radius over the next 4 hours, showing one symbol (clouds, sun/moon, rain, or snow) for each hour.

feat.name: 木精靈魔法
entries: 你學會來自你族人們守護和尊崇的原初森林的魔法。你學會一個自選的德魯伊戲法。你也學會{@spell 大步奔行}和{@spell 行蹤無跡}法術，你可以各施放它們一次而無須消耗法術位。當你完成一次長休，你將重新獲得通過這個方式施放這兩個法術的能力。這三個法術的施法屬性是感知。

feat.name: 木精靈魔法
entries: 你學會來自你族人們守護和尊崇的原初森林的魔法。你學會一個自選的德魯伊戲法。你也學會{@spell 大步奔行}和{@spell 行蹤無跡}法術，你可以各施放它們一次而無須消耗法術位。當你完成一次長休，你將重新獲得通過這個方式施放這兩個法術的能力。這三個法術的施法屬性是感知。
